content.question: ​Terms in a sequence are given by <math alttext="s subscript n equals 4 n plus 7"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>s</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, for <math alttext="n equals 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 comma horizontal ellipsis"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0,1,2,3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>…</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following describes the sequence?

choices.label: ​The sequence is geometric with an initial value of <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a common ratio of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The sequence is geometric with an initial value of <math alttext="11"><semantics><mn>11</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a common ratio of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The sequence is arithmetic with an initial value of <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a common difference of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​The sequence is arithmetic with an initial value of <math alttext="11"><semantics><mn>11</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a common difference of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​​The sequence is arithmetic with an initial value of <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a common difference of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
